name: The Book Troll
description:
Beginning of a short story game developed for the 2021 narrative driven jam.

I underestimated the time commitment for everything I was wanting to do but feel free to give me any feedback or suggestions!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Left click to pick up books
  • E to interact with key objects and conversation 
  • WASD or Arrow keys to select dialogue option and space to select option
  • Escape to skip dialogue, R to restart, P to quit game
